body: Bao, If you upload your GH file, I can verify the exact cause but I believe this is happening because you have set the reciurculatedAirPerArea_ on the "Set EnergyPlus Zone Loads" component to a value other than 0.  By default, the "Autosize" feature on EnergyPlus/OpenStudio will only size the VAV system to deal with thermal loads and so it usually sizes the system to be too small to handle the required recirculated air for programs like hospital patient rooms.  For this reason, I built in a hard-sizing capability whenever you specify a non-zero reciurculatedAirPerArea_.  If you just set this recirculatedAir value to 0, you will get the default, Autosize capability like in the attached file: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ssLxNXwJhIwdu50K-XQjVQYoAOt0FoIGvYH0vcrU1xIVwshn2XEhj1pKYcjavHji2DagsChT4U5bs0tbeaCWF-u6M-PETOAA/CorrectSizing.JPG) -Chris
